verses.verse: Now <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%>, and <S%H6086>timber<s%> of <S%H730>cedars<s%>, with <S%H7023>masons<s%> and <S%H2796>carpenters<s%>, to <S%H1129>build<s%> him an <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3045>perceived<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H3559>confirmed<s%> him <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, for his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> was lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> on <S%H4605>high<s%>, because of his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> more <S%H802>wives<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3205>fathered<s%> more <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%>.
Now these are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of his <S%H3205>sons<s%> which he had in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; <S%H8051>Shammua<s%>, and <S%H7727>Shobab<s%>, <S%H5416>Nathan<s%>, and <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>,

And when the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H4886>anointed<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> over all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, all the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>. And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of <S%H3318>it<s%>, and went out against <S%H6440>them<s%>.
And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H6584>spread<s%> themselves in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Shall I go <S%H5927>up<s%> against the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>? and will you <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them into my <S%H3027>hand<s%>? And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5927>him<s%>, Go up; for I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them into your <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

So they came <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H1188>Baal<s%>–perazim; and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> them <S%H1732>there<s%>. Then David <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> has broken <S%H6555>in<s%> upon my <S%H341>enemies<s%> by my <S%H3027>hand<s%> like the breaking <S%H6556>forth<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%>: therefore they <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H1188>Baal<s%>–perazim.
And when they had <S%H5800>left<s%> their <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H1732>there<s%>, David gave a <S%H559>commandment<s%>, and they were <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>.
And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> yet <S%H3254>again<s%> spread themselves <S%H6584>abroad<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%>.

Therefore <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> again of <S%H430>God<s%>; and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5927>him<s%>, Go not up <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5437>them<s%>; turn away from <S%H935>them<s%>, and come upon them over <S%H4136>against<s%> the mulberry <S%H1057>trees<s%>.

And it shall <S%H8085>be<s%>, when you shall hear a <S%H6963>sound<s%> of <S%H6807>going<s%> in the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the mulberry <S%H1057>trees<s%>, that then you shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%>: for <S%H430>God<s%> is gone <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you to <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H4264>army<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>.

<S%H1732>David<s%> therefore <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H5221>him<s%>: and they struck the <S%H4264>army<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> from <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> even to <S%H1507>Gazer<s%>.

And the <S%H8034>fame<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> into all <S%H776>lands<s%>; and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>brought<s%> the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of him upon all <S%H1471>nations<s%>.
